themes: reallocation of public funds to arts
support for emerging and marginalized artists
key_phrases: strongly opposing the (unnecessary) proposed new convention center (5.6 Billion dollars!!)
put 10% of that into Arts and Culture bond fund
emerging artists/ artists who have less access to platforms of expression
barriers_identified: artists who have less access to platforms of expression
solutions_proposed: allocate 10% of convention center funds to Arts and Culture bond fund
use funds to support artist residencies
support arts and music event places
